main event: A witness observed an irregularly shaped object, the size of a grapefruit, with a bright steel bluish color flying at a very high altitude in New York on October 13, 1957.
interesting points: The object was on a straight course from west to east,The observation lasted approximately 30 seconds,The sighting occurred in an area with heavy air traffic,The object was described with an irregular shape,The report concludes the object could be an aircraft or balloon.
sighted object: irregular shaped object, size of grapefruit, bright steel bluish color
witness description: A witness in the New York area
